General.Name: AER Energy Resources Inc
General.Description: AER Energy Resources, Inc., through its subsidiaries, engages in acquiring, managing, and operating oil and gas properties in North America. The company is also involved in the recycling of used motor oil; marketing of related fuel and energy products to users, suppliers, and recycler's; and real estate business. AER Energy Resources, Inc. was founded in 1989 and is based in Scottsdale, Arizona.
General.Address: 7150 East Camelback Road, Scottsdale, AZ, United States, 85251
